description:
Kamishiro Matasaka is the former leader of the http://anidb.net/t7110 [ghouls] in the 6th ward. He inherited the surname "Kamishiro" from his mentor. He looked after http://anidb.net/ch65638 [Rize], who was on the run from http://anidb.net/ch98950 [V] at the time, as his foster daughter. Most people refer to him by his nickname Orca or Shachi.
He is a strong ghoul, well-versed in the martial arts. When he was the leader of the ghouls in the 6th ward, he trained and strengthened his followers. However, he was captured, due to Rize`s actions, and was sent to http://anidb.net/ch95846 [Cochlea].
However, he was freed during the Second Cochlea Raid, and temporarily joined http://anidb.net/ch70052 [Aogiri Tree] after an agreement with http://anidb.net/ch66564 [Yoshimura].
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Kamishiro Matasaka
